content: Viet didn't just write code; he architected a solution that saved our Black Friday sale. His foresight to implement Redis caching and separate our microservices prevented a catastrophic crash. A true strategic partner.

I've worked with many developers, but Viet stands out for his ability to translate vague business requirements into robust technical specifications. He mentored our junior team while delivering the RAG system ahead of schedule.

Viet's mastery of distributed systems is impressive. He identified a bottleneck in our websocket architecture that had plagued us for months and fixed it in a week. Our dashboard latency dropped by 80%.

Beyond his technical skills, Viet is a reliability rock. When our legacy sync engine failed, he calmly architected a new offline-first solution that rescued our user data. He's the engineer you want in a crisis.
